scripts.setup: mkdir -p node_modules/@codebuff && cp -r ../../dist node_modules/@codebuff/sdk && cp ../../package.json node_modules/@codebuff/sdk/
scripts.test:compile: tsc test-types.ts --outDir ./dist --skipLibCheck && cd dist && node test-types.js
scripts.test:all: npm run setup && npm run test && npm run test:types
